org.apache.shardingsphere.api.hint

类 HintManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.shardingsphere.api.hint.HintManager
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    AutoCloseable

    public final class HintManager
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    The manager that use hint to inject sharding key directly through ThreadLocal.
    作者:
    gaohongtao, zhangliang, panjun

      • setDatabaseShardingValue

        public void setDatabaseShardingValue(Comparable<?> value)
        Set sharding value for database sharding only.

        The sharding operator is =

        参数:
        value - sharding value

        The sharding operator is =

        参数:

        value - sharding value
